mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY r.receive_time) AS bno, receive_no, pet_name, owner_name, type_name, pet_no,receive_state, DATE_FORMAT(r.receive_time,'%H:%i') as receive_time, DATE_FORMAT(r.reservation_date,'%H:%i') as reservation_date FROM (SELECT * FROM receptionview WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND (reservation_yn = 'Y' OR reservation_yn IS NULL) ) r ORDER BY receive_state DESC, receive_time;
